DOC.detailed_description: Compared bioelectrical impedance analysis guide hydration therapy versus standard hydration prevention contrast induced-acute kidney injury
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1890 yr 2 . Chronic kidney disease stage 3 & 4 ( eGFR 1560 ml/min/m2 ) 3. elective cardiac catheterization 1 . Contrast medium administration past 14 day 2. congestive heart failure ( NYHA IIIIV , ascites , pleuropericardial effusion , severe valvular heart disease 3 . Kidney transplant status RRT 4 . Emergency cardiac catheterization 5 . Allergy radiographic contrast medium 6 . Unstable renal function ( change serum creatinine â‰¥ 0.5 mg/dl 25 % within 14 day prior study 7 . Not inform consent 8. leave ventricular ejection fraction < 40 % 9 . Liver cirrhosis child B C 10 . Dosage angiotensinconverting enzyme inhibitor /angiotensin II receptor blocker change past 2 wk
